instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: A1418 - iMac 21,5" - 4K - 2017
threads.message:
Hey guys,

any experience with these kind of models? New SSD inside (thought bad HDD), sometimes its booting normal, somtimes not, crashing - last time this half yellow screen. A photo is attached.

Any ideas? Are these boards dying?

[ATTACH type="full"]60891[/ATTACH]

threads.title: A1418 - iMac 21,5" - 4K - 2017
threads.message:
Did you test with external monitor?
If you can always start correctly in safe mode (check that), then graphics issue very likely.

threads.title: A1418 - iMac 21,5" - 4K - 2017
threads.message: looks like safe mode is booting normally...so game over for this imac?

threads.title: A1418 - iMac 21,5" - 4K - 2017
threads.message:
You can try to reflow GPU at least.
It may last 1-2 years, or hours...
